description: PlayHT is #1 AI Voice Generator with 600+ AI voices that creates ultra realistic Text to Speech voiceovers. Convert text to audio and download as MP3 & WAV files.
title: AI Voice Generator: Realistic Text to Speech and AI Voiceover | PlayHT
keywords: text to speech, voice generator, ai voices, text to voice, speech synthesizer, text to mp3, free text to speech, text to audio
introduction: PlayHT is an online Studio for creating AI clones and voiceovers. It offers a range of plans including a Free Plan, Creator Plan, Unlimited Plan, and Enterprise Plan. The platform provides access to a variety of AI voices and languages, with options for unlimited characters, instant voice clones, and high-fidelity voice clones.
features: Access to all voices and languages
targetPeople: Individuals and teams of all sizes

faqs.question: Do you offer a free version?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a Free Plan available with access to all voices and languages, with attribution to PlayHT required.

faqs.question: How much does an AI voice cost?
faqs.answer: The pricing varies based on the plan chosen, with options ranging from USD $348.00 to custom pricing for Enterprise plans.

faqs.question: Can I use the voices for commercial purpose?
faqs.answer: Yes, commercial and re-sell rights are included in the Enterprise Plan.

faqs.question: Is there a free AI tool that can convert text to speech?
faqs.answer: PlayHT offers a Free Plan for creating AI clones and voiceovers, which can be used for text-to-speech generation.
